data.eml:eml: Neothalassius, a new genus of Parathalassiinae (Diptera: Dolichopodidae s. lat.) from the Pacific coast of South America

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Brooks, Scott E., Cumming, Jeffrey M. (2016): Neothalassius, a new genus of Parathalassiinae (Diptera: Dolichopodidae s. lat.) from the Pacific coast of South America. Zootaxa 4066 (3): 311-322, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4066.3.7
